description: React component rendering an empty home screen for a note-taking app, with navigation and alert buttons.

methods.name: HomeScreenEmpty()
methods.description: React functional component for the empty home screen, includes event handlers for buttons.

methods.name: handleSearch
methods.description: Displays a placeholder alert for search action.

methods.name: handleInfo
methods.description: Displays a placeholder alert for information action.

methods.name: handleAdd
methods.description: Navigates to the '/editor' route to add a new note.
